lines: 1. 'Bogim' obuya mbweng'ebuna rito rikogwaBun' ebigar' ebiom' obe ang'e.Matuko nkoer' arenababe batugutwe;Mabera nkoer' ar' obe ang'e.
Ob' ang'e, ob' ang'eYeso gakorangeria obe ang'eGoteban' as' ebibegesieri nagesiekweBirero biao mbosa ob' ang'e.
2. Bisicha biya bisira basae bagota,Tori n'engaki entamb' obe ang'e;Nyasae okorang'eirie tiga ogotayaya;Karwe as' obosiru obe ang'e.
3. Bwang' engaki neete,emechando echiche,Tama goch' ase Yes' obe ang'e;Kab' aye omong'ainitosiekerwa isiko;Erio oche gosir' obe ang'e.
4. Aye omonyabibe Igw'eriogo ria Yeso,Aba Igoro bagok' obe ang'e;Tama korw' omosunteBweoroki' ase Yeso,'Chak' orogendobon' obe ang'e.
